title: The original land under Chemical Industry, which has been certified by the Director of Industries / Director of Industrial Safety and Health / Competent Authority as permanently closed or having shifted elsewhere shall be allowed to be developed as per the relevant provisions in the prevailing Development Control Regulations
clause_text: The original land under Chemical Industry, which has been certified by the Director of Industries / Director of Industrial Safety and Health / Competent Authority as permanently closed or having shifted elsewhere shall be allowed to be developed as per the relevant provisions in the prevailing Development Control Regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
